channel.title: GameBefore RSPS [718] - Gaming your way!
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://www.gamebeforestudios.com"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.gamebeforestudios.com/beta"]Webclient(BETA)[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.gamebeforestudios.com/GameBeforeClient718.jar"]Desktop Client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.gamebeforestudios.com/forum"]Forums[/URL]
Welcome to GameBefore Studios
GameBefore is there to provide you the best gaming experience around. We ensure you that you won't forget the time you have spend in GameBefore.
To make it all easy for you, we have a live chat open on our website where you can ask whatever you want!
We have an active forum, with daily website, game, forum and shop updates. To make sure everyone fits in the GameBefore community we try to do as many updates as we can that have been suggested from our member! The Live chat is not 24/7 yet, but will be in the future. The Server is 24/7 and is now hosted on a powerful Server-PC. We are DDoS-Protected and have hourly backups of all our files.
Anyway, that’s enough said about the GameBefore Services!
Features of the GameBefore RSPS:
* All skills are working (Including Construction). * Quests: Including Recruitment Drive * Custom Gamebefore Bosses! * A large range of RS Bosses to conquer and defeat! * A large range of places to level up your combat levels! * Duel arena * Barrows * Stealing Creations * Livid Farm * RuneSpan * God Wars Dungeon * Fight Caves & Fight Kiln * Custom dungeoneering, with a lot of levels to complete! * Summoning familairs to help you out! * Advanced Herblore! * Advanced Agility Courses! * Clue Scrolls * Loyalty Points & Shop * Veteran Cape After 200 hours of playing! * Prestige System!
* And a lot more!
We are also releasing a new website with a market place, highscores (with comparing) and alot more! You can also login with your in-game details!
Current highscore(Background colors can be set by your own at the control panel!) [IMG]http://gyazo.com/575ec3435114216983b340e99d4c8de4.png[/img] Highscore compairing: [IMG]http://gyazo.com/02ffa4c056ff3730a19dca751aae74c5.png[/img] Want to sell anything? The market is here for you! [IMG]http://gyazo.com/4509e2024cd90619b639657cd91d07f1.png[/img] Need a house? [IMG]http://gyazo.com/ebf10af1ea3c7e1a35ce4224b83949df.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/2b5763133f8721dac78aec7eeb4b2b7c.png[/img] Perfect Friend chats. [IMG]http://gyazo.com/350085eeaab5864072125d5c4e6b4a6d.png[/img] Control panel [IMG]http://gyazo.com/8e4d7b96b228b6576e58f136afe13413.png[/img] Never have a messy bank again! [IMG]http://gyazo.com/43a9c9a8b98223df7fec9e11a022e855.png[/img] The early community! [IMG]http://gyazo.com/53eeb5c220fbf9e12a133046e799a1d9.png[/img]
Help Shape Gamebefore: [url=http://www.gamebeforestudios.com/forum]GamebeforeStudios | Forum | Home[/url]
You have seen some of the awesome content we have in game, now come and join us at: [url=http://www.gamebeforestudios.com]GameBefore | Home[/url][/CENTER]

item.title: GameBefore RSPS [718] - Gaming your way!
item.dc:creator: @Bink Bink
item.description:
@Bink wrote:

[CENTER][URL=http://“http://www.gamebeforestudios.com”]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.gamebeforestudios.com/beta”]Webclient(BETA)[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.gamebeforestudios.com/GameBeforeClient718.jar”]Desktop Client[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.gamebeforestudios.com/forum”]Forums[/URL]

Welcome to GameBefore Studios

GameBefore is there to provide you the best gaming experience around.
We ensure you that you won’t forget the time you have spend in GameBefore.

To make it all easy for you, we have a live chat open on our website where you can ask whatever you want!

We have an active forum, with daily website, game, forum and shop updates.
To make sure everyone fits in the GameBefore community we try to do as many updates as we can that have been suggested from our member!
The Live chat is not 24/7 yet, but will be in the future.
The Server is 24/7 and is now hosted on a powerful Server-PC.
We are DDoS-Protected and have hourly backups of all our files.

Anyway, that’s enough said about the GameBefore Services!

Features of the GameBefore RSPS:

  • All skills are working (Including Construction).

  • Quests: Including Recruitment Drive

  • Custom Gamebefore Bosses!

  • A large range of RS Bosses to conquer and defeat!

  • A large range of places to level up your combat levels!

  • Duel arena

  • Barrows

  • Stealing Creations

  • Livid Farm

  • RuneSpan

  • God Wars Dungeon

  • Fight Caves & Fight Kiln

  • Custom dungeoneering, with a lot of levels to complete!

  • Summoning familairs to help you out!

  • Advanced Herblore!

  • Advanced Agility Courses!

  • Clue Scrolls

  • Loyalty Points & Shop

  • Veteran Cape After 200 hours of playing!

  • Prestige System!

  • And a lot more!

We are also releasing a new website with a market place, highscores (with comparing) and alot more!
You can also login with your in-game details!

Current highscore(Background colors can be set by your own at the control panel!)

Highscore compairing:

Want to sell anything? The market is here for you!

Need a house?


Perfect Friend chats.

Control panel

Never have a messy bank again!

The early community!
